author: MSNBC.com
title: New book explores emotional turmoil of Central Park Five Case
description: Yusef Salaam, of the Exonerated Central Park Five, and Ibi Zoboi are out with a book that’s based partly on their experiences. The book is called “Punching the Air.”
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: MSNBC to air 'The Way I See It' documentary about Pete Souza, October 9 at 10pm ET
description: Rachel Maddow alerts viewers that MSNBC will air the documentary "The Way I See It" about presidential photographer Pete Souza on October 9 at 10pm ET, shortly after it opens in theaters.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Different coronavirus landscape increases risk of post-Labor Day weekend spike
description: Rachel Maddow notes that the U.S. has more coronavirus cases with wider distribution and more places open to the public this Labor Day holiday weekend than Memorial Day and Fourth of July weekends, which both saw corresponding spikes is positive cases.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Multiple news outlets mirror report of Trump denigrating veterans, military service
description: Rachel Maddow reports on several news outlets that followed a report in the Atlantic of Donald Trump disparaging veterans and military service with matching reporting of their own, including Fox News, rendering denials from the Trump camp hollow.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump’s reported remarks about veterans, war dead continues to rankle among military
description: Anger and condemnation continue after several news outlets reported that President Trump has repeatedly made disparaging remarks about the sacrifices made by members of the military and their families. Many of those who served are speaking out.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Experts dispute CDC readiness with COVID vaccine by Nov. 1
description: Donald Trump apparently touting a potential COVID vaccine in some form by Nov. 1 is called highly improbable by experts, as María Teresa Kumar hosts AM JOY on MSNBC.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Kamala Harris chief of staff slams Trump school opening methods
description: Joe Biden is calling students’ return to school amid the coronavirus pandemic a national emergency. Kamala Harris Chief of Staff Karine Jean-Pierre slams the Trump administration’s reopening methodology, as María Teresa Kumar hosts AM JOY on MSNBC.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Joyce Vance: Ending federal anti-racism trainings reveals Trump’s commitment to white supremacy
description: Former U.S. attorney and University of Alabama law professor Joyce Vance says refusing to educate prosecutors, law enforcement and other federal officials about systemic racism is “reprehensible.”

title: Gold Star father Khizr Khan: ‘Trump is incapable of understanding service, valor and courage’
description: Khizr Khan, father of the late Captain Humayun Khan, recalls his son’s final sacrifice and responds to Trump’s reported remarks about Americans killed at war.

title: Velshi: Trump has a history of disrespecting the military
description: MSNBC’s Ali Velshi says Trump’s recently reported insults to veterans should come as no surprise after his comments about the late John McCain and George H.W. Bush.

title: Experts on hurt service members feel over alleged Trump comments

author: MSNBC.com
title: Activist believes addressing inequality key to solving policing
description: Protests against police brutality, and for greater racial and social justice continue across the U.S. Co-founder of Black Lives Matter, Alicia Garza, shares her view that addressing income and other inequalities are keys to solving policing issues.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Velshi: More gig worker protections the cost of a just society

source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Actor and director John Leguizamo on new film, activism
description: Actor and director John Leguizamo discusses his new film ‘Critical Thinking,’ empowering young people of color to achieve, and the resiliency of New York City, as María Teresa Kumar hosts AM JOY on MSNBC.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Beto O’Rourke on what he sees as big changes in Texas electorate

author: MSNBC.com
title: Booker: Attorney general seems to have abandoned justice reform

title: Trump’s ‘Law and Order’ strategy falls flat

MSNBC’s Alicia Menendez is joined by an expert panel -…
